Token.Abstract: This category adds methods to the UIKit framework's UIRefreshControl class. The methods in this category provide support for automatically begining and ending refreshing depending on the loading state of a request operation or session task.
Binds the refreshing state to the state of the specified task.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: The task. If nil, automatic updating from any previously specified operation will be diabled.

Token.Abstract: Binds the refreshing state to the execution state of the specified operation.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation. If nil, automatic updating from any previously specified operation will be disabled.
